document_data.name: Volo's Guide to Calimport
document_data.author: [[Volothamp Geddarm]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Volo's Guide to Calimport''''' was a book written by [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. It was a travelogue about the city of [[Calimport]] in [[Calimshan]]. It was written over [[1364 DR|1364]] to [[1365 DR]], but went officially unreleased, as all final drafts were destroyed by [[Calimshan|Calishite]] [[pasha]]s and agents of [[Rundeen]]. Only Volo's notes and an older draft were extant.

Nevertheless, around [[1372 DR]], this older draft was in the holdings at [[Candlekeep]].
